      • renderPage

        public void renderPage()
                throws ControllerException,
                       PortalException
        Description copied from class: PresentationControllerHtml
        Renders a portal page. Based on the logged on user, pageId passed and channelId passed in the request query string, this method calculates and renders the appropriate page. This method also checks if there is a ProcessAction to be handled before rendering the page. Based on the page mode, this method either calls #renderPageAdminModeor PresentationControllerHtml.renderPage()
        Overrides:
